shot.composition: Medium Close-Up (MCU) of the surgeon, slightly low angle for authority, rule of thirds applied
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Smooth Steadicam tracking, slight 0.5 second dolly in at the start to emphasize intimacy. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Seated, upright, confident, hands clasped on the desk

facial_features.hair: Short, salt and pepper, professionally styled

wardrobe.upper_body: Immaculate white medical coat over a high-quality sky blue shirt
wardrobe.accessories: Discreet luxury steel watch, white gold wedding band

sequences.primary_motion: The surgeon slightly nods in approval, then takes a pen and points to a document on the desk. Slow and measured movement.
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Private consultation office in a high-end aesthetic surgery clinic

layout.width: Spacious, with a large dark wood desk and two light leather armchairs
layout.walls: Off-white painted walls, with a framed diploma and minimalist abstract artwork

environment.background: Artistic blur (bokeh) on a window revealing a well-kept garden, symbolizing serenity and nature
environment.props: An open notebook, a crystal-clear glass of water, a discreet anatomical model
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Soft natural light coming from a large window (soft window light) as Key Light
lighting.quality: Soft diffused, flattering lighting without harsh shadows
lighting.color_temperature: 5600K (Neutral daylight), slightly warmed by fill light
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: 2:1 (Moderate contrast for a professional and reassuring look)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Neutral tones, pure whites, subtle blues and greens (calming medical colors)
color_grading.tone: Calm, professional, luxurious and very slightly desaturated for a mature cinematic look

audio.ambient: Very low background noise of a quiet clinic (distant murmurs, discreet air conditioning)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Subtle sound of pen touching paper, light rustling of the coat. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Very soft and minimalist instrumental background music (piano and strings), slow tempo. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, focus on hyperrealism and texture detail

quality_requirements.hyperrealism_level: Extreme photorealism, focus on skin texture and fabric detail

visual_rules.realism: Warm ambiance with professional welcoming lighting. Luxurious textures of materials (wood, fabrics, stone). High-end furnishing details. Authentic service and human interactions.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of lighting and sound ambiance. Maintaining service level and attention to detail. Continuity of decorative style and atmosphere. Smoothness of client experience and interactions.

technical_specifications.render_engine_focus: Coherence of subject's expression and action
